originalText.text: There are so many wonderful things about Sunshine- a stimulating curriculum, exciting programming, and early/late drop-off options. But above all, Sunshine has the most loving, nurturing, and attentive teachers and staff. It has been a pleasure watching our kids thrive under their care!

text.text: There are so many wonderful things about Sunshine- a stimulating curriculum, exciting programming, and early/late drop-off options. But above all, Sunshine has the most loving, nurturing, and attentive teachers and staff. It has been a pleasure watching our kids thrive under their care!

originalText.text: I love Sunshine. My kids have had a wonderful experience here. I’m confident they are well cared for, are receiving a high quality education, and feel safe and loved.

text.text: I love Sunshine. My kids have had a wonderful experience here. I’m confident they are well cared for, are receiving a high quality education, and feel safe and loved.

originalText.text: We had a very positive experience! Our son joined Sunshine LC of Lexington when he turned two and was there for a full year. The teachers are exceptional. The center had to close for a couple of weeks during the pandemic. During that time they froze tuition and provided a free program on Zoom to keep the students engaged! They put together a very robust reopening plan that was very clearly communicated to the families. A wonderful learning center, I highly recommend it!

text.text: We had a very positive experience! Our son joined Sunshine LC of Lexington when he turned two and was there for a full year. The teachers are exceptional. The center had to close for a couple of weeks during the pandemic. During that time they froze tuition and provided a free program on Zoom to keep the students engaged! They put together a very robust reopening plan that was very clearly communicated to the families. A wonderful learning center, I highly recommend it!

originalText.text: My daughter has been attending Sunshine Lexington for a little less then 2 years. Already having experience with many daycare's as I have an older child, Sunshine stand outs. They are professional, courteous and sanitary. The teachers and staff are top notch and the curriculum is supherb! My 2 year old is more advanced and sociable thanks to this center. Everything about the child is documented as it happens and they even include pictures and videos. Money well spent! If they have a waiting list it's for a good reason!

text.text: My daughter has been attending Sunshine Lexington for a little less then 2 years. Already having experience with many daycare's as I have an older child, Sunshine stand outs. Everything about the child is documented as it happens and they even include pictures and videos. Money well spent! If they have a waiting list it's for a good reason!

originalText.text: Sunshine at Lexington & 101 is the best daycare in the area. Their facilities look and feel brand-new, there is plenty of natural light, and the center is designed to feel like a small school to help students transition from the center to a school building. I spent a day shadowing my son's class and I saw the teachers speaking lovingly and intentionally to the students. When one student started to get wound up, the teacher stopped the distraction quickly and explained to the student that his action concerned her not only for the other children's safety but also for that child's safety (a very child centered classroom). The curriculum is appropriately rigorous and allows ample play time for each developmental stage.  The director of the school has her PhD in Early Childhood Edu/Dev, is very personable, and hands on - she is often found in the classroom interacting with the students (when us parents aren't tying her up lol).  The icing on the cake, our son came to Sunshine after being at two other daycare centers - at both the previous centers he was content. He would go in and come back - no real highs or lows.  After his first day at Sunshine, however, we were leaving and he asked, "Mommy, can I stay longer to play with my new friends?" On his second day, when he caught sight of the center on our walk there, he said, "There's my school! It's my favorite!" To this day, his excitement for school stays high.  Our whole family loves the experience we've received here and will keep our (now) two children in this center until Kindergarten.  Trusting someone with your child can be a tough decision (it was for us, which is why this was our third and last center to enroll our son in) but I hope this review helps you see you can trust this center - making your decision a little easier. They also use an app called Tadpoles that sends you photos of your child throughout the day, which is just heart warming. Such a phenomenal center! Hope to see you around the center soon.
